ing: 1/2 cup granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®)
des: "This is a peach plum jam that is easy to make and tastes great. You can freeze it and put it on ice cream. "
ins: Combine peaches, plums, and water in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl. Heat in the microwave on high in 3 minute intervals, stirring between heating, until mixture is very thick, about 15 minutes. Stir in the cinnamon, ginger, and sweetener. Pour fruit butter into a jar. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
